books.name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: The first book in the iconic fantasy series following the adventures of a young wizard, Harry Potter.

books.name: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A classic novel exploring racial injustice and moral growth in the American South during the 1930s.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel depicting a totalitarian society, surveillance, and the struggle for individual freedom.

books.name: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: Set in the Roaring Twenties, this novel delves into the American Dream, wealth, and social classes.

books.name: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.description: A coming-of-age novel narrated by a disenchanted teenager, exploring themes of alienation and identity.

books.name: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: A fantasy novel detailing the journey of Bilbo Baggins as he accompanies a group of dwarves on a quest.

books.name: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A classic romantic novel exploring themes of class, manners, and the complexities of love.

books.name: The Da Vinci Code
books.author: Dan Brown
books.description: A thriller that combines art, history, and cryptography as Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon investigates a murder.

books.name: The Hunger Games
books.author: Suzanne Collins
books.description: The first book in a dystopian trilogy where teenagers are forced to participate in a televised fight to the death.

books.name: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
books.author: Douglas Adams
books.description: A comedic science fiction series that follows the intergalactic misadventures of Arthur Dent after Earth's destruction.

books.name: Sapienssssss: A Brief History of Humankind
books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: An exploration of the history and impact of Homo sapiens, from the emergence of Homo sapiens in Africa to the present day.

books.name: abcd
books.author: Douglas Adams
books.description: A comedic science fiction series that follows the intergalactic misadventures of Arthur Dent after Earth's destruction.
